DOC.brief_summary: The aetiology of SAPHO syndrome seems to involve genetic, infectious and immunological components. The investigators examined innate and adaptative immune responses in SAPHO syndrome as compared with psoriatic arthritis and rheumatoid arthritis.
DOC.brief_title: Immune Response in the SAPHO Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of SAPHO syndrome Must have bone lesions Infliximab treatment
